node:basic-information.basic-information:component-overview: Cup to be packed for transportation

security-objectives:security-objective.security-objective:name: Cup integrity
security-objectives:security-objective.security-objective:description: We want to prevent the cup from being broken while transported to its destination.

security-objectives:security-objective.security-objective:name: Cup availability
security-objectives:security-objective.security-objective:description: We want to prevent the cup from being lost while transported to its destination.

vulnerabilities:vulnerability.vulnerability:name: Fragility
vulnerabilities:vulnerability.vulnerability:description: If the cup is hit, it could break

vulnerability:reference-security-service.vulnerability:description: The cup could be taken by someone, or it could be lost in transit

threats:threat.threat:name: Cup being hit
threats:threat.threat:description: Container or Cup 2 may hit Cup 1 during transport

risks:risk.risk:description: Cup 1 may break because Container or Cup 2 may hit it during transport
Any cup(s) may be lost/stolen because somebody may take them out of the box

security-policies:security-policy.security-policy:name: Cup hit protection
security-policies:security-policy.security-policy:description: The cup must be protected from hitting against other cups (or any other object) inside the box, or against the box itself, while being transported to its final destination

security-policies:security-policy.security-policy:name: Cup lost prevenction
security-policies:security-policy.security-policy:description: The cup must be protected so that it cannot be taken out of the box, while being transported to its final destination

security-controls:security-control.security-control:name: Cup hit protection
security-controls:security-control.security-control:description: Install a soft padded protection around every cup, such that they do not hit to each other, and they do not move or hit the box

security-controls:security-control.security-control:name: Cup lost protection
security-controls:security-control.security-control:description: Install a lock in the box, proportional to the level of robustness of the container

security-objectives:security-objective.security-objective:description: We want to prevent the cup from being broken while transported to its destination.

vulnerabilities:vulnerability.vulnerability:description: If the cup is hit, it could break

vulnerability:reference-security-service.vulnerability:description: The cup could be taken by someone, or it could be lost in transit

threats:threat.threat:name: Cup being hit
threats:threat.threat:description: Container or Cup 1 may hit Cup 2 during transport

risks:risk.risk:description: Cup 2 may break because Container or Cup 1 may hit it during transport
Any cup(s) may be lost/stolen because somebody may take them out of the box

security-policies:security-policy.security-policy:name: Cup hit protection
security-policies:security-policy.security-policy:description: The cup must be protected from hitting against other cups (or any other object) inside the box, or against the box itself, while being transported to its final destination

security-policies:security-policy.security-policy:description: The cup must be protected so that it cannot be taken out of the box, while being transported to its final destination

node:basic-information.basic-information:component-overview: A couple of cups to be transported

security-objectives:security-objective.security-objective:name: Cups integrity
security-objectives:security-objective.security-objective:description: We want to prevent the cups from being broken while transported to its destination.

security-objectives:security-objective.security-objective:name: Cups availability
security-objectives:security-objective.security-objective:description: We want to prevent the cups from being lost while transported to its destination.

threats:threat.threat:name: Cup being hit
threats:threat.threat:description: The cups could hit each other or the container during transport

risks:risk.risk:description: Any cup(s) may break because they hit each other or with the Container during transport
Any cup(s) may be lost/stolen because somebody may take them out of the box

security-policies:security-policy.security-policy:name: Cup hit protection
security-policies:security-policy.security-policy:description: Every cup must be protected from hitting against other cups (or any other object) inside the box, or against the box itself, while being transported to its final destination

security-policies:security-policy.security-policy:name: Cup lost prevenction
security-policies:security-policy.security-policy:description: The cups must be protected so that they cannot be taken out of the box, while being transported to its final destination

security-controls:security-control.security-control:name: Cup hit protection
security-controls:security-control.security-control:description: Install a soft padded protection around every cup, such that they do not hit to each other, and they do not move or hit the box

security-controls:security-control.security-control:name: Cup lost protection
security-controls:security-control.security-control:description: Install a lock in the box, proportional to the level of robustness of the container

node:basic-information.basic-information:component-overview: A paper label with the legend "Fragile Handle with care"

basic-information:component-intrinsical-.component-intrinsical-properties:materia: Paper Succeptible to water Can be written on

security-objectives:security-objective.security-objective:name: Content label integrity
security-objectives:security-objective.security-objective:description: We want to prevent the fragile label from being damaged while transported to its destination.

security-objectives:security-objective.security-objective:name: Container availability
security-objectives:security-objective.security-objective:description: We want to prevent the fragile label from being removed while transported to its destination.

vulnerabilities:vulnerability.vulnerability:name: Content label damage
vulnerabilities:vulnerability.vulnerability:overview: The fragile label may be damaged
vulnerabilities:vulnerability.vulnerability:impact: The fragility of the contents would no longer be indicated

vulnerabilities:vulnerability.vulnerability:name: Fragile label removed
vulnerabilities:vulnerability.vulnerability:overview: The fragile label could be removed
vulnerabilities:vulnerability.vulnerability:impact: If the fragile label is removed it can no longer protect the contents of the box from breaking

threats:threat.threat:name: Fragile label damage
threats:threat.threat:description: Somebody/something may damage or leave the fragile label illegible during transport

threats:threat.threat:name: Fragile label removal
threats:threat.threat:description: Somebody/something may remove/destroy the fragile label

risks:risk.risk:name: Fragile label damage
risks:risk.risk:description: Fragile label may be damaged or left illegible by somebody/something during transport

risks:risk.risk:name: Fragile label removal
risks:risk.risk:description: Fragile label may be removed/destroyed by somebody/something

security-policies:security-policy.security-policy:name: Fragile label removal
security-policies:security-policy.security-policy:description: The fragile label should be protected from breaking or being removed from the box, accidentally or intentionally, or they should be replaced by labels that cannot be easily removed

security-controls:security-control.security-control:name: Fragile label removal
security-controls:security-control.security-control:description: Install a protection to the label, such as a transparent adhesive tape that is suitable for installation in the box, or replace the labels with different material that cannot be easily removed, for example, ink labels.

node:basic-information.basic-information:component-overview: A paper label with the legend «Content: 2 cups»

basic-information:component-intrinsical-.component-intrinsical-properties:materia: Paper Succeptible to water Can be written on

security-objectives:security-objective.security-objective:name: Content label integrity
security-objectives:security-objective.security-objective:description: We want to prevent the content label from being damaged while transported to its destination.

security-objectives:security-objective.security-objective:name: Container availability
security-objectives:security-objective.security-objective:description: We want to prevent the content label from being removed while transported to its destination.

vulnerabilities:vulnerability.vulnerability:name: Content label damage
vulnerabilities:vulnerability.vulnerability:overview: The content label may be modified or damaged
vulnerabilities:vulnerability.vulnerability:impact: The content of the box would no longer be guaranteed

vulnerabilities:vulnerability.vulnerability:name: Content label removed
vulnerabilities:vulnerability.vulnerability:overview: The content label could be removed
vulnerabilities:vulnerability.vulnerability:impact: If the content label is removed it can no longer protect the contents of the box

threats:threat.threat:name: Content label damage
threats:threat.threat:description: Somebody/something may damage or change value of content label during transport

threats:threat.threat:name: Content label removal
threats:threat.threat:description: Somebody/something may remove/destroy the content label

risks:risk.risk:name: Content label damage
risks:risk.risk:description: Content label may be modified if somebody/something damage or change the content value during transport

risks:risk.risk:name: Content label removal
risks:risk.risk:description: Content label may be removed/destroyed by somebody/something

security-policies:security-policy.security-policy:name: Content label removal
security-policies:security-policy.security-policy:description: The Content label should be protected from breaking or being removed from the box, accidentally or intentionally, or they should be replaced by labels that cannot be easily removed

security-controls:security-control.security-control:name: Content label removal
security-controls:security-control.security-control:description: Install a protection to the labels, such as a transparent adhesive tape that is suitable for installation in the box, or replace the labels with different material that cannot be easily removed, for example, ink labels.

node:basic-information.basic-information:component-overview: A box designed to hold a couple of cups

basic-information:component-intrinsical-.component-intrinsical-properties:fragili: Rigid Cardboard Slightly shock absorbing Succeptible to water

security-objectives:security-objective.security-objective:name: Container integrity
security-objectives:security-objective.security-objective:description: We want to prevent the Container from being broken while transported to its destination.

security-objectives:security-objective.security-objective:name: Container availability
security-objectives:security-objective.security-objective:description: We want to prevent the Container from being lost while transported to its destination.

vulnerabilities:vulnerability.vulnerability:name: Container damage
vulnerabilities:vulnerability.vulnerability:impact: Damage to the box could damage the cups

vulnerabilities:vulnerability.vulnerability:name: Container loss
vulnerabilities:vulnerability.vulnerability:impact: If the container is lost, the cups would be too

threats:threat.threat:name: Container damage
threats:threat.threat:description: Somebody/something may hit the Container during transport

threats:threat.threat:name: Container loss
threats:threat.threat:description: Somebody/something may take/steal the Container during transport

risks:risk.risk:name: Container damage
risks:risk.risk:description: Container may be damaged because somebody/something may hit it during transport

security-policies:security-policy.security-policy:name: Container hit
security-policies:security-policy.security-policy:description: The carrier should have insurance or a contract for the transport service that ensures the integrity and availability of the package during transport of the package to its final destination

security-controls:security-control.security-control:name: Container hit
security-controls:security-control.security-control:description: Sign insurance or a transport contract that includes the integrity and availability of the components to be transported

node:basic-information.basic-information:component-overview: A package containing two cups packed for transport

security-objectives:security-objective.security-objective:name: Cup-Package integrity
security-objectives:security-objective.security-objective:description: We want to prevent the Cup-Package from being broken while transported to its destination.

security-objectives:security-objective.security-objective:name: Cup-Package availability
security-objectives:security-objective.security-objective:description: We want to prevent the Cup-Package from being lost while transported to its destination.

vulnerabilities:vulnerability.vulnerability:name: Cup-Package damage
vulnerabilities:vulnerability.vulnerability:impact: Damage to the Cup-Package could damage the cups

vulnerabilities:vulnerability.vulnerability:name: Cup-Package loss
vulnerabilities:vulnerability.vulnerability:impact: If the Cup-Package is lost, the cups would be too

threats:threat.threat:name: Cup-Package damage
threats:threat.threat:description: Somebody/something may hit the Cup-Package during transport

threats:threat.threat:name: Cup-Package loss
threats:threat.threat:description: Somebody/something may take/steal the Cup-Package during transport

risks:risk.risk:name: Cup-Package damage
risks:risk.risk:description: Cup-Package may be damaged because somebody/something may hit it during transport

security-policies:security-policy.security-policy:name: Container hit
security-policies:security-policy.security-policy:description: The carrier should have insurance or a contract for the transport service that ensures integrity and availability of the package during transport of the package to its final destination

security-controls:security-control.security-control:name: Cup-Package hit
security-controls:security-control.security-control:description: Sign insurance or a transport contract that includes the integrity of the components to be transported
